trans-unit.source: Provides methods to copy, cut, move, delete, and paste objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供复制、 剪切、 移动、 删除和粘贴对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified objects can be pasted.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可粘贴指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: A list of items to be pasted.
trans-unit.target: 要粘贴的项列表。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified objects can be pasted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可粘贴指定的对象;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object for resolving types used by the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于解析类型由对象<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object for resolving types used by the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 解决使用的类型的对象<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current designer is the default container.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前设计器是否为默认容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current designer is the default container; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前设计器为默认容器;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invoked after the start of a move operation to complete the moving of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 用于完成移动指定的项的移动操作开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The item to move.
trans-unit.target: 要移动的项。

trans-unit.source: Invoked after the start of a copy operation to complete the copying of the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 复制操作以完成复制指定的项的开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The items to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的项。

trans-unit.source: The items cloned from the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 从指定项中克隆的项。

trans-unit.source: Invoked after the start of a cut operation to complete the cutting of the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 用于完成剪切指定项的剪切操作开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The items to cut.
trans-unit.target: 要剪切的项。

trans-unit.source: The items cloned from the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 从指定项中克隆的项。

trans-unit.source: Invoked after the start of a delete operation to complete the deletion of the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成删除指定项的删除操作开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The items to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的项。

trans-unit.source: Invoked after the start of a paste operation to complete the pasting of the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 在粘贴操作以完成指定的项粘贴开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The items to paste.
trans-unit.target: 要粘贴的项。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the items to paste.
trans-unit.target: 与要粘贴的项关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The location where to paste the items.
trans-unit.target: 位置粘贴项的位置。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the paste location.
trans-unit.target: 对粘贴位置的引用。
